programme.title: Those Who Wish Me Dead
They Want Me Dead
programme.desc:
Those Who Wish Me Dead: Directed by Taylor Sheridan. With Angelina Jolie, Finn Little, Jon Bernthal, Aidan Gillen. A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3215824/","name":"Those Who Wish Me Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAxMmQ0NTAtNDllNC00ZjE2LTlkNjUtMmExNmY0MmNkMDQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYyOTM1ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3215824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Movi3DO"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Average although decent thrill","reviewBody":"A brand new movie just added to HBO Max. A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3215824, Title: Those Who Wish Me Dead, --- Description: Those Who Wish Me Dead: Directed by Taylor Sheridan. With Angelina Jolie, Finn Little, Jon Bernthal, Aidan Gillen. A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3215824/","name":"Those Who Wish Me Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAxMmQ0NTAtNDllNC00ZjE2LTlkNjUtMmExNmY0MmNkMDQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYyOTM1ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3215824/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Movi3DO","dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Average although decent thrill","reviewBody":"A brand new movie just added to HBO Max. A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: غضب الرجل
Cash Truck
programme.desc: غضب الرجل: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Rocci Williams, Josh Hartnett. The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11083552/","name":"Wrath of Man","alternateName":"غضب الرجل","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkOTlhOTktNjZiNS00NDg3LWIxMDAtZTY5Y2E0YjllN2IxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11083552/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ritchie does another crime thriller","reviewBody":"In L. A., an armored truck is robbed and the two drivers are killed. Patrick Hill (Jason Statham) barely passes the tests to be the new hire at the company. When his truck gets hit, he turns into the Terminator.\n\nThis is a Guy Ritchie film. It's a mid-level action thriller. It mostly works although it insists on following the story from all sides which leaves the film at almost two hours. By grouping the different sides separately, they do feel a bit split especially the story of the robbers. I do wonder if the search for the inside man would be a more compelling path. Ritchie is trying for a tighter thriller than his usual. It's him slimmed down. He uses his action skills but this is not going to be considered one of his best or most inventive.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":133744,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-05-13","keywords":"revenge,remake,police,shootout,non linear narrative","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Get Tickets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3455041561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious and wild-eyed new cash truck security guard (Jason Statham) surprises his coworkers during a heist in which he unexpectedly unleashes precision skills. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksman's ultimate motive becomes clear as he takes dramatic and irrevocable steps to settle a score."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564697/","name":"Holt McCallany"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001326/","name":"Josh Hartnett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0099398/","name":"Nicolas Boukhrief"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078704/","name":"Éric Besnard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Absolution: Directed by Keoni Waxman. With Steven Seagal, Byron Mann, Howard Dell, Adina Stetcu. Contract killer John Alexander (Steven Seagal, "Under Siege") has a chance to save an innocent girl from a powerful mob boss, but protecting her means betraying the government agency that hired him and putting his own life at risk." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3503840/","name":"Absolution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NjY0NzYzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM2MzI4NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Contract killer John Alexander (Steven Seagal, "Under Siege") has a chance to save an innocent girl from a powerful mob boss, but protecting her means betraying the government agency that hired him and putting his own life at risk.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3503840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sonofjorel316"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"A return to form for Seagal?","reviewBody":"Without any spoilers as a direct to DVD film this is one of Seagal better efforts. Please don't listen to the critic's Technically it's a well executed film. Seagal and Mann make a great team together and whilst Vinnie Jones is not in the film a great deal he's a very believable bad guy because quite frankly playing psychos is what Vinnie does best.

I rated It an 8 as an action film because the story and pace and action kept me entertained. 

I do recommend this to fans of Seagal.

Please view for yourself and decide.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3368,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2015-05-15","keywords":"time bomb,ukraine,weapon,nightclub shootout,car","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Absolution","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2094774809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTk1NzkwNjktMTNjYy00YjI3LWJkNDUtZjM3NTZkMzRkYzQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTk1NzkwNjktMTNjYy00YjI3LWJkNDUtZjM3NTZkMzRkYzQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Absolution"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000219/","name":"Steven Seagal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542677/","name":"Byron Mann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0217320/","name":"Howard Dell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915394/","name":"Keoni Waxman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0507691/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020879/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064174/","name":"Richard Beattie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915394/","name":"Keoni Waxman"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades
Escape Plan 2

Filming in the constant rain must have been unpleasant, but it contributes greatly the the amazing visual experience.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14820,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-30","keywords":"umbrella,martial arts,king,training,underwater scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1197849881","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ0ZDBlZDgtM2E5MS00N2U5LTk2MmEtN2UxYmM5YTA2OTI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ0ZDBlZDgtM2E5MS00N2U5LTk2MmEtN2UxYmM5YTA2OTI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a kingdom ruled by a young and unpredictable king, the military commander has a secret weapon: a "shadow," a look-alike who can fool both his enemies and the King himself. programme.title: Those Who Wish Me Dead
They Want Me Dead
programme.desc:
Those Who Wish Me Dead: Directed by Taylor Sheridan. With Angelina Jolie, Finn Little, Jon Bernthal, Aidan Gillen. A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3215824/","name":"Those Who Wish Me Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAxMmQ0NTAtNDllNC00ZjE2LTlkNjUtMmExNmY0MmNkMDQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYyOTM1ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3215824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Movi3DO"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Average although decent thrill","reviewBody":"A brand new movie just added to HBO Max. A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3215824/","name":"Those Who Wish Me Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAxMmQ0NTAtNDllNC00ZjE2LTlkNjUtMmExNmY0MmNkMDQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYyOTM1ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3215824/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Movi3DO","dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Average although decent thrill","reviewBody":"A brand new movie just added to HBO Max. A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: غضب الرجل
Cash Truck
programme.desc: غضب الرجل: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Rocci Williams, Josh Hartnett. The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11083552/","name":"Wrath of Man","alternateName":"غضب الرجل","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkOTlhOTktNjZiNS00NDg3LWIxMDAtZTY5Y2E0YjllN2IxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11083552/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ritchie does another crime thriller","reviewBody":"In L. A., an armored truck is robbed and the two drivers are killed. Patrick Hill (Jason Statham) barely passes the tests to be the new hire at the company. When his truck gets hit, he turns into the Terminator.\n\nThis is a Guy Ritchie film. It's a mid-level action thriller. It mostly works although it insists on following the story from all sides which leaves the film at almost two hours. By grouping the different sides separately, they do feel a bit split especially the story of the robbers. I do wonder if the search for the inside man would be a more compelling path. Ritchie is trying for a tighter thriller than his usual. It's him slimmed down. He uses his action skills but this is not going to be considered one of his best or most inventive.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":133744,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-05-13","keywords":"revenge,remake,police,shootout,non linear narrative","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Get Tickets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3455041561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious and wild-eyed new cash truck security guard (Jason Statham) surprises his coworkers during a heist in which he unexpectedly unleashes precision skills. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksman's ultimate motive becomes clear as he takes dramatic and irrevocable steps to settle a score."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564697/","name":"Holt McCallany"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001326/","name":"Josh Hartnett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0099398/","name":"Nicolas Boukhrief"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078704/","name":"Éric Besnard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Doorman
The Doorman – Tödlicher Empfang
programme.desc: The Doorman: Directed by Ryûhei Kitamura. With Ruby Rose, Jean Reno, Aksel Hennie, Rupert Evans. A woman returns from combat and befriends a family in NYC. A gang of thieves plot to take the family's valuables, and she is all that stands between them and their lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6222118/","name":"The Doorman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzEwYTQ0NWYtZTVjYS00NGNlLWIwMDctYjA3MDQ4OWNiYjMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman returns from combat and befriends a family in NYC. A gang of thieves plot to take the family's valuables, and she is all that stands between them and their lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6222118/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ginocox-206-336968"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Adequate, but uninspired","reviewBody":"The Doorman (2020) is fairly typical of low-budget direct-to-video made-in-Eastern-Europe fare. Production values are better than average for similar films. The actors do as well as can be expected with the material they're provided. But the screenplay is uninspired, with far too many coincidences, contrivances, and familiar tropes. The movie seems very similar to Force of Nature (2020), starring Mel Gibson, which also suffered from far too many coincidences.\n\nRuby Rose handles her fight scenes fairly well, but could have been replaced by a department store mannequin in some of the other scenes. Jean Reno delivers an effortless performance as the villain, which is nevertheless interesting to watch. Aksel Hennie, Rupert Evans, and Philip Whitchurch deliver credible performances. Some scenes drag; many are predictable. It's what might be termed a multi-tasking video, one that can be watched while doing something else without missing much.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5499,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-09","keywords":"martial arts,gang,karate,kung fu,bone breaking","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Doorman","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1706279193","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjUxODhjYzYtMjJhNC00NDlkLTg3MTAtZTQyNDkxN2U3ZDRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjUxODhjYzYtMjJhNC00NDlkLTg3MTAtZTQyNDkxN2U3ZDRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3199307/","name":"Ruby Rose"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000606/","name":"Jean Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0377336/","name":"Aksel Hennie"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0457565/","name":"Ryûhei Kitamura"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0359051/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303054/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0775344/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2790197/","name":"Lior Chefetz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2751870/","name":"Joe Swanson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12257041/","name":"Devon Rose"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
Das Bourne-Vermächtnis
programme.desc: The Bourne Legacy: Directed by Tony Gilroy. With Jeremy Renner, Scott Glenn, Stacy Keach, Edward Norton. An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1194173/","name":"The Bourne Legacy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4Njk3MDM1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODgyOTMxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1194173/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DUKEJBM"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Deeper Look At The Bourne Universe And That's A Good Thing!","reviewBody":"As a fan of the Bourne franchise, I enjoyed this deeper look in to that universe. The movie really does feel like one giant glorified DVD extra for that trilogy and I mean that in a good way. Deeper layers are revealed and the intrigue is as good as what we've seen before even though the character motivation isn't as strong across the board. Renner is fabulous as the second generation super spy. My only real complaint about this installment (because it does feel like they are blatantly building for three more films) is that the resolution has no real teeth. Still, it's a very good effort from a very good cast with hints and touches to the Bourne films of the past.\n\nOverall, a thumbs up and a very enjoyable time at the cinema."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":294970,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-09-05","keywords":"wolf,drone,pill,assassin,riding a motorcycle up stairs","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1065461017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk2MjY1NDIzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI4NjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk2MjY1NDIzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI4NjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719637/","name":"Jeremy Renner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001838/","name":"Rachel Weisz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319659/","name":"Dan Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524924/","name":"Robert Ludlum"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stargate
Stargate
programme.desc:
Stargate: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With Kurt Russell, James Spader, Jaye Davidson, Viveca Lindfors. An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0111282/","name":"Stargate","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWEyYTQzNzQtZTg5OS00NDhkLTg1NjYtMzA5Y2MyYjYzNWQ5L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0111282/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Almost Twenty Years Later and after Watching at Least Six Times, the Timeless "Stargate" is still a Fantastic Sci-Fi","reviewBody":"In 1928, in Egypt, a strange device is found by an expedition. In the present days, the outcast linguist Dr. Daniel Jackson (James Spader) is invited by a mysterious woman to decipher an ancient hieroglyph in a military facility. Soon he finds that the device was developed by an advanced civilization and opens a portal to teletransport to another planet. Dr. Jackson is invited to join a military team under the command of Colonel Jonathan 'Jack' O'Neil (Kurt Russell) that will explore the new world. They find a land that recalls Egypt and humans in a primitive culture that worship and are slaves to Ra, the God of the Sun. But soon they discover the secret of the mysterious "stargate". 

"Stargate" is still a fantastic sci-fi after almost twenty years and watching it at least six times. The story is intriguing and entwines action with humor and romance. The cast is excellent, with Kurt Russell and James Spade in the top of their careers. The special effects are still great after almost twenty years. And the haunting music score completes this timeless classic sci-fi with a touch of class. My vote is nine.

Title (Brazil): "Stargate - A Chave para o Futuro da Humanidade" ("Stargate – The Key for the Future of Mankind")

Note: On 18 May 2017, I saw this film again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":184667,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1994-10-28","keywords":"portal,hieroglyph,archeology,stargate,military","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000621/","name":"Kurt Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000652/","name":"James Spader"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001109/","name":"Jaye Davidson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071034/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094459/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002041/","name":"Dean Devlin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Raw Deal
Der City-Hai
programme.desc: Raw Deal: Directed by John Irvin. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Kathryn Harrold, Sam Wanamaker, Paul Shenar. A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0091828/","name":"Raw Deal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTVkNWIwZmYtMzM5MS00ZTcwLWI0ZjEtNTVlMTNjZWViNzliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0091828/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dworldeater"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"It is the audience that gets a raw deal from this troubled production","reviewBody":"In Arnold's best period of his film career, it is unquestionable that Raw Deal is his worst film from that era. Sandwiched between two of his best action movies, Commando and Predator. Raw Deal is real weak by comparison. The film is a mess and it seemed that those involved with the production could not agree on what they were making. Also, it would appear that funds were too low for anyone's vision to get on screen. The editing and music for this movie is really poorly done. This film is definitely lacking in a consistent tone or focus. The action scenes seem out of place as well. Raw Deal was probably meant to be a low budget police thriller. Any way you slice it, this film is not a cohesive piece of work and is filled with plot holes. Arnold, at this point in his career had massive physicality and charisma. However, he was lacking in acting skills and was horrendous in the more dramatic scenes here. The supporting cast was pretty good for the most part. Even though this is not Arnie's highest quality production, it still remains fairly entertaining. There is quite a bit of funny stuff here(some intentional and some not). Also, there is plenty of Arnold one liners with one of my favorites, "You should not drink and bake". While Raw Deal is not a well made movie, it is not totally unwatchable and is still quite amusing and outrageous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33406,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1986-06-06","keywords":"gang war,undercover,infiltration,shootout,violence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi572373529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNkNGFlZDctOWMxMS00Njg4LTgwY2EtYTU5MTM0ZDI0ZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNkNGFlZDctOWMxMS00Njg4LTgwY2EtYTU5MTM0ZDI0ZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002130/","name":"Kathryn Harrold"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910737/","name":"Sam Wanamaker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410139/","name":"John Irvin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046277/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0490761/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0898812/","name":"Luciano Vincenzoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006872/","name":"Sergio Donati"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0222904/","name":"Gary DeVore"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
An jedem verdammten Sonntag
programme.desc:
Any Given Sunday: Directed by Oliver Stone. With Al Pacino, Cameron Diaz, Dennis Quaid, James Woods. A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0146838/","name":"Any Given Sunday","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk2YTQxZjUtYzJkYi00MTk4LTk4NDAtZmQ3ZGQwMDQxY2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0146838/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Don-102"},"dateCreated":"2000-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Dizzying, Entertaining Peek Into Pro Football...Stone Style","reviewBody":"Sports movies are tough to make. Creating the essence of the actual event is the toughest. Most films fall short in the editing process of the event or through sheer carelessness and lack of knowledge. ANY GIVEN SUNDAY is somewhat of an exception. It is hard-hitting and bloody like NORTH DALLAS FORTY. It is actually conventional when you think about it, like a warped RUDY. It is a hell of a lot more realistic than say, NECESSARY ROUGHNESS. These are all football films with varying degrees of success (except ROUGHNESS), but Oliver Stone, in his usual over the top way, throws a dizzying, mind-splitting film at us, much like the sport itself. This is why I liked it.

Oliver Stone began a wicked spell of filmmaking with JFK, evident in its editing style. Fast-paced, black and white mixed with color, documentary-like methods ensued in NATURAL BORN KILLERS, NIXON, and the ghastly U-TURN. Nothing is new here with ANY GIVEN SUNDAY. Football is a battlefield Stone chooses to depict and depict it he does. Even the most ardent fans of the sport do not really know what it is like for a quarterback to drop back and get rid of a piece of pigskin before 11 players maul him. You certainly get the idea watching this. 

Al Pacino is the dried up head coach of the fictional Miami Sharks and he barks out the usual coaching cliches you hear in press conferences after real games. Pacino also seems to be sleep-walking through the picture. At times, he appears drunk even when he is not supposed to be. Cameron Diaz's character, a young chick owner, (yeah right) destroys any credibility the film may have had going in (Even the NFL would have nothing to do with this movie). Her constant bickering is so over-done, you almost feel like hurling much the way Jamie Foxx does every time he enters a game as the team's 3rd string quarterback. Realisticly speaking, this is not a very sane film about football. It is a maniacal celebration of the game. The scenes on the field are the ones I cherished. Beware of the locker room or domestic sequences.

No one has ever put such energy into football scenes in a film before. He definitely had some good consultants. There are some comical cameos - Johnny Unitas and Dick Butkus play opposing coaches. Lawrence Taylor can actually act a teeny bit and Jim Brown shares the film's best off the field scene with Pacino in a bar. Stone tries to show us how the game has changed. He resonates past glory with quotes from Lombardi, dissolves showing Red "the Galloping Ghost" Grange, and even Unitas handing off to Ameche. TV has changed everything, says the coach, and he is right. It seems to be all about the money nowadays.

That is the message, but you'll find yourself losing that idea in the lunacy of ANY GIVEN SUNDAY and the bone-crushing, ear-damaging football scenes. They are filmed and cut with such raw intensity, you feel like playing afterwards. This is definitely a film for football fans only unless you like big, sweaty men. Is there a big game at the end that needs to be won? Yes, and this surprised me considering how unconventional Stone usually is. Basically, surrender your senses and thought process to Stone's most entertaining film in quite some time.

RATING: ***","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":116425,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"1999-12-22","keywords":"nudity,black penis,american football,male objectification,man wrapped in a towel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000598/","name":"Dennis Quaid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000231/","name":"Oliver Stone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119040/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001946/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002417/","name":"Daniel Pyne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517589/","name":"John Logan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000231/","name":"Oliver Stone"}],"duration":"PT2H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
Rendezvous mit Joe Black
programme.desc:
Meet Joe Black: Directed by Martin Brest. With Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins, Claire Forlani, Jake Weber. Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119643/","name":"Meet Joe Black","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0MzRmMTgtMTk4OS00MzdkLWJjNWMtZWJmZjlkYTI0YWRiL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119643/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Pork_Scratchings"},"dateCreated":"2000-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best films of 1998, I can't praise this film enough!","reviewBody":"I must admit to have been slightly hesistant when I first heard about Meet Joe Black because of the subject matter and its length, however I found this film to be superb.

The acting was believable, the cinematography of the film was well thought out and extremely picturesque. The soundtrack by Thomas Newman (the Shawshank Redemption) went from chilling to the most beautiful melodies that I have ever heard (giving, in my humble opinion, any classical composer a run for their money), adding an extra depth to this film.

There are no in-betweens in this film: you WILL either love or hate this film. However, I can say that this film is one of the most uplifting and life affirming movies that I have ever seen. It left me both moved and confident that the world was not such a bad place after all. Just like the Shawshank Redemption told us that hope is not a bad thing, so Meet Joe Black tells us that indeed love can conquer all better than Titanic ever could.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":229526,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-11-13","keywords":"death,birthday,wealth,death personified,fear of death","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001231/","name":"Claire Forlani"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000976/","name":"Martin Brest"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045196/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651592/","name":"Ron Osborn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719734/","name":"Jeff Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905458/","name":"Kevin Wade"}],"duration":"PT2H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hulk
Hulk
programme.desc:
Hulk: Directed by Ang Lee. With Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, Josh Lucas. Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0286716/","name":"Hulk","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQwZDg1MGEtN2E5My00ZDJlLWI4MzItM2U2MjJhYzlkNmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDAxNjkxNjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286716/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CGA_Soupdragon"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very impressive!","reviewBody":"I finally caught up with the film on DVD, after missing its cinema release and just not having the urge to see it until now. It has had some rather bad press, so I wasn't actually expecting very much.

One of the reasons I have waited so long was to let my son, (who is now eight) grow up a bit before seeing it. He was interested in the tie-in products filling the shelves in all the stores on release. A blanket-marketing ploy that is becoming more and more hysterical, I fear.

Another was that I was wary of renting it as the Hulk character has been rather mal-treated in live-action form.

Until Ang Lee's film.

Firstly, this isn't by any stretch of the imagination, a kids' film. Though my younger children watched it, it gave them serious food for thought about what scientists do to animals and people in the name of science. My oldest was enthralled. She appreciated Lee's magnificent use of the film medium.

This is a very dark movie. The origin-story has been manipulated and updated linking the two lead characters (Bana and Connelly) in a sorrowful, fearful event that happened to them both in their childhood. Nice touch.

"Banner's" (Eric Bana's) father (played by Nick Nolte) shuffles back into his life after 30 years incarceration for causing the events that had traumatized the young Banner. Banner later finds that his father had "experimented" on him when they were still a whole family. This creepy device effectively modernizes the story and it's ultimate revelation is a clever way of releasing the pent-up rage that Banner jr has locked within his mind. This rage feeds the Hulk. Banner finally becomes the Hulk after some incredible bravery in the lab.

The film's effects are superb. I am a very happy viewer. This is great cinema. A wonderful adaptation of a tortured, misunderstood human being.

Highly recommended, by me, for true Hulk fans."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":261186,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2003-06-20","keywords":"radiation,monster,scientist,general,technology","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hulk","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1139409177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQyNGIxMzctM2NkYy00ZWY4LWIwN2MtYzJmNDQ3MDJiNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQyNGIxMzctM2NkYy00ZWY4LWIwN2MtYzJmNDQ3MDJiNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0051509/","name":"Eric Bana"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000124/","name":"Jennifer Connelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000385/","name":"Sam Elliott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092570/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0456158/","name":"Jack Kirby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770005/","name":"James Schamus"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer
Fantastic Four – Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer: Directed by Tim Story. With Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis. Directed by Josh Boone (The Fault in our Stars) and written by Josh Boone & Knate Lee, The New Mutants stars: Maisie Williams (Game of Thrones); Anya Taylor-Joy (Glass); Charlie Heaton (Stranger Things); Alice Braga (Predators); Blu Hunt (The Originals); and Henry Zaga (13 Reasons Why). The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

Zack Snyder's Justice League, determined to ensure Superman’s (Henry Cavill) ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne (Ben Affleck) aligns forces with Diana Prince (Gal Gadot) with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions. The task proves more difficult than Bruce imagined, as each of the recruits must face the demons of their own pasts to transcend that which has held them back, allowing them to come together, finally forming an unprecedented league of heroes. Now united, Batman (Affleck), Wonder Woman (Gadot), Aquaman (Jason Momoa), Cyborg (Ray Fisher), and The Flash (Ezra Miller) may be too late to save the planet from Steppenwolf, DeSaad, and Darkseid and their dreadful intentions."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0147147/","name":"Henry Cavill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2933757/","name":"Gal Gadot"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028338/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754095/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796950/","name":"Jerry Siegel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795975/","name":"Joe Shuster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"}],"duration":"PT4H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hulk
Hulk
programme.desc:
Hulk: Directed by Ang Lee. With Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, Josh Lucas. Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0286716/","name":"Hulk","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQwZDg1MGEtN2E5My00ZDJlLWI4MzItM2U2MjJhYzlkNmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDAxNjkxNjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286716/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CGA_Soupdragon"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very impressive!","reviewBody":"I finally caught up with the film on DVD, after missing its cinema release and just not having the urge to see it until now. It has had some rather bad press, so I wasn't actually expecting very much.

One of the reasons I have waited so long was to let my son, (who is now eight) grow up a bit before seeing it. He was interested in the tie-in products filling the shelves in all the stores on release. A blanket-marketing ploy that is becoming more and more hysterical, I fear.

Another was that I was wary of renting it as the Hulk character has been rather mal-treated in live-action form.

Until Ang Lee's film.

Firstly, this isn't by any stretch of the imagination, a kids' film. Though my younger children watched it, it gave them serious food for thought about what scientists do to animals and people in the name of science. My oldest was enthralled. She appreciated Lee's magnificent use of the film medium.

This is a very dark movie. The origin-story has been manipulated and updated linking the two lead characters (Bana and Connelly) in a sorrowful, fearful event that happened to them both in their childhood. Nice touch.

"Banner's" (Eric Bana's) father (played by Nick Nolte) shuffles back into his life after 30 years incarceration for causing the events that had traumatized the young Banner. Banner later finds that his father had "experimented" on him when they were still a whole family. This creepy device effectively modernizes the story and it's ultimate revelation is a clever way of releasing the pent-up rage that Banner jr has locked within his mind. This rage feeds the Hulk. Banner finally becomes the Hulk after some incredible bravery in the lab.

The film's effects are superb. I am a very happy viewer. This is great cinema. A wonderful adaptation of a tortured, misunderstood human being.

Highly recommended, by me, for true Hulk fans."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":261186,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2003-06-20","keywords":"radiation,monster,scientist,general,technology","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hulk","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1139409177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQyNGIxMzctM2NkYy00ZWY4LWIwN2MtYzJmNDQ3MDJiNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQyNGIxMzctM2NkYy00ZWY4LWIwN2MtYzJmNDQ3MDJiNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0051509/","name":"Eric Bana"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000124/","name":"Jennifer Connelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000385/","name":"Sam Elliott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092570/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0456158/","name":"Jack Kirby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770005/","name":"James Schamus"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin
Lucky Number Slevin
programme.desc:
Lucky Number Slevin: Directed by Paul McGuigan. With Josh Hartnett, Bruce Willis, Lucy Liu, Morgan Freeman. A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0425210/","name":"Lucky Number Slevin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjczMWI1YWMtYTZjOS00ZDc5LWE2MWItMTY3ZGUxNzFkNjJmL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get h","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0425210/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wmjaho"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wow! Great Noir Caper Flick","reviewBody":"2006 Sundance Film Festival From the opening scene in Lucky Number Slevin, you will be straining to keep up. People are getting killed left and right, and it's never clear until the end of the movie how they are all connected. But you know it fits somehow and Scottish director Paul McGuigan (Wicker Park) manages to keep you guessing while firmly grabbing your attention and holding it with hardly a second to take a breath.

In the film noir tradition, but with the intense and graphic violence of the Lock Stock and Layer Cake genre, Slevin is really a caper movie, and frankly reminded me more of The Sting than anything else. It dances nimbly from grisly stomach-churning action to clever and light-hearted banter. This could only be accomplished by a truly incredible cast, led by Josh Hartnett in an outstanding performance, great work by Lucy Liu, Bruce Willis doing his thing, and supported by the always excellent Morgan Freeman and Ben Kingsley. There's even a little time for Stanley Tucci.

Liu plays Lindsay, the next-door-neighbor/natural sleuth/coroner/love interest who discovers Slevin in her neighbor Nick's apartment. They mystery that immediately engages her is what happened to Nick, who never shows up. However, plenty of people do show up, mistaking Slevin for Nick, and before long he is neck deep in murder contracts, called debts and warring gang factions. Hartnett plays the role to perfection. I've never seen him this good. He is both convincing and empathetic as a glib, fearless victim of mistaken identity, yet filled with confidence that he can make his plan work.

This is a terrific film, assuming you can stomach the bloody violence. The pieces fit neatly together (well, I have one bone to pick with the scriptwriter, but it would be revealing too much to share it). I highly recommend Lucky Number Slevin.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":307783,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-05-10","keywords":"original story,assassin,jewish mafia,organized crime,hitman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lucky Number Slevin","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2073493785","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGM3ZGM3YmQtZWNjZi00ZGRlLWIxOWMtNTUxOTFlMTRkMWYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGM3ZGM3YmQtZWNjZi00ZGRlLWIxOWMtNTUxOTFlMTRkMWYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from The Weinstein Company"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001326/","name":"Josh Hartnett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006476/","name":"Paul McGuigan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150452/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063593/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429512/","name":"Jason Smilovic"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

Zack Snyder's Justice League, determined to ensure Superman’s (Henry Cavill) ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne (Ben Affleck) aligns forces with Diana Prince (Gal Gadot) with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions. The task proves more difficult than Bruce imagined, as each of the recruits must face the demons of their own pasts to transcend that which has held them back, allowing them to come together, finally forming an unprecedented league of heroes. Now united, Batman (Affleck), Wonder Woman (Gadot), Aquaman (Jason Momoa), Cyborg (Ray Fisher), and The Flash (Ezra Miller) may be too late to save the planet from Steppenwolf, DeSaad, and Darkseid and their dreadful intentions."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0147147/","name":"Henry Cavill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2933757/","name":"Gal Gadot"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028338/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754095/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796950/","name":"Jerry Siegel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795975/","name":"Joe Shuster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"}],"duration":"PT4H2M"}</script><metacontent="

When strange occurrences begin to take place, both their new mutant abilities and their friendships will be tested as they battle to try and make it out alive. Directed by Josh Boone (The Fault in our Stars) and written by Josh Boone & Knate Lee, The New Mutants stars: Maisie Williams (Game of Thrones); Anya Taylor-Joy (Glass); Charlie Heaton (Stranger Things); Alice Braga (Predators); Blu Hunt (The Originals); and Henry Zaga (13 Reasons Why). The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"],"duration":"PT1H34M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spider-Man
Spider-Man
programme.desc:
Spider-Man: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Willem Dafoe, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco. When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145487/","name":"Spider-Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDEyN2NhMjgtMjdhNi00MmNlLWE5YTgtZGE4MzNjMTRlMGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUyOTg3Njg@._V1_.jpg","description":"When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145487/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"to_kill_better"},"dateCreated":"2002-06-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazingly Spectacularly Great","reviewBody":"Having seen the trailers for this film I have to say that I didn't walk into the cinema with high hopes. The computer effects looked badly integrated, the Green Goblin's costume looked awful and comic book adaptations usually have such painful scripting and plotting. Thankfully I was wrong on most counts (The Goblin still looks rubbish).

As it turns out, this is probably the best super-hero film I've yet seen - certainly up there with Superman and Batman. People seem to automatically comment that the script and acting was bad because they expect it to be the case in these films; and indeed it usually is. But if you go into Spider-man without this prejudicial attitude you'll be pleasently suprised. The acting is generally great - there is never a time when anyone is not believable as their character and you think "Hey, that's an actor, not Peter Parker". The effects do look artificial but the pace of the movie means you don't have time to dwell on this and the script is fine! What do people want, Shakespearian soliloquies? That would sound incredibly out-of-place in modern day New York. There are few of the painful cliches or dreadful dialogue that plague films like The Phantom Menace and the catchphrases like "friendly neighbourhood spider-man" are fully in-keeping with the character.

 The comic turns from J.J. Jameson hit the mark, the snarling facial contortions of Willem Defoe were suitably evil-looking (and the conversation with his mirror-image was a great touch). My only gripe was with the Green Goblin's costume. Very monotone green and not very scary.

All-in-all a great film that I wouldn't hesitate for a second in recommending."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":755785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2002-06-12","keywords":"superhero,may parker character,peter parker character,ben parker character,spiderweb","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1497605145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDYyNzU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1NDk2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDYyNzU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1NDk2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Spider-Man"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228492/","name":"Steve Ditko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Man 2: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco, Alfred Molina. Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0316654/","name":"Spider-Man 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY2ODk4NmUtOTVmNi00ZTdkLTlmOWYtMmE2OWVhNTU2OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0316654/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ditkovich_rent"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie has a criminally low rating","reviewBody":"7.3/10? Seriously? Most mediocre MCU films get a better rating than that. This movie is up there with The Dark Knight as one of the best superhero movies. This movie was loved when it came out, now it's cool to hate on the trilogy. Spider-Man 2 improved on all aspects of Spider-Man 1. Peter is struggling to be Spider-Man, and the movie illustrates that very well. The action is better than lots of movies today, most notably the train fight scene. Danny Elfman provides an unforgettable soundtrack. This movie and the trilogy shouldn't be overlooked as some cheesy 2000s movies, because they paved the way for the MCU as we know it today.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":601585,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-07-14","keywords":"peter parker character,older actors younger roles,may parker character,spider man character,ben parker character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi629801241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZmNmMyMjUtMjA2ZC00MjMxLTk1NTEtMjdhYmYxNWUxZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZmNmMyMjUtMjA2ZC00MjMxLTk1NTEtMjdhYmYxNWUxZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228492/","name":"Steve Ditko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0332184/","name":"Alfred Gough"}],"duration":"PT2H7M"}</script><metacontent="

Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0316654/","name":"Spider-Man 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY2ODk4NmUtOTVmNi00ZTdkLTlmOWYtMmE2OWVhNTU2OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0316654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ditkovich_rent","dateCreated":"2019-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie has a criminally low rating","reviewBody":"7.3/10? Seriously? Most mediocre MCU films get a better rating than that. This movie is up there with The Dark Knight as one of the best superhero movies. This movie was loved when it came out, now it's cool to hate on the trilogy. Spider-Man 2 improved on all aspects of Spider-Man 1. Peter is struggling to be Spider-Man, and the movie illustrates that very well. The action is better than lots of movies today, most notably the train fight scene. Danny Elfman provides an unforgettable soundtrack. This movie and the trilogy shouldn't be overlooked as some cheesy 2000s movies, because they paved the way for the MCU as we know it today.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":601585,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-07-14","keywords":"peter parker character,older actors younger roles,may parker character,spider man character,ben parker character","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi629801241","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZmNmMyMjUtMjA2ZC00MjMxLTk1NTEtMjdhYmYxNWUxZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZmNmMyMjUtMjA2ZC00MjMxLTk1NTEtMjdhYmYxNWUxZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228492/","name":"Steve Ditko","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0332184/","name":"Alfred Gough"],"duration":"PT2H7M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
